insert into chu_wxuser (USERID, NAME, DEPARTMENT, POSITION, MOBILE, GENDER, EMAIL, WEIXINID, AVATAR, STATUS, EXTATTR, APP_ID, TAG_NO) values
(#{item.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weixinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.extattr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update chu_wxuser
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT REGEXP concat('[\[,]',#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'[\],]'),
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIXINID = #{weixinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXTATTR = #{extattr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TAG_NO REGEXP concat('[\[,]'," #{tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}",'[\],]'),
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
